neqsim.process.util.reconciliation.DataReconciliationEngine

Packages that use DataReconciliationEngine
Package
Description
neqsim.process.util.reconciliation
Data reconciliation and steady-state detection for online process optimization.

  • Uses of DataReconciliationEngine in neqsim.process.util.reconciliation

    Methods in neqsim.process.util.reconciliation that return DataReconciliationEngine
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    DataReconciliationEngine
    DataReconciliationEngine.addConstraint(double[] coefficients)
    Adds a linear constraint row: sum(coefficients[i] * variable[i]) = 0.
    DataReconciliationEngine
    DataReconciliationEngine.addConstraint(double[] coefficients, String name)
    Adds a named linear constraint row: sum(coefficients[i] * variable[i]) = 0.
    DataReconciliationEngine
    DataReconciliationEngine.addMassBalanceConstraint(String name, String[] inletNames, String[] outletNames)
    Convenience method to add a mass balance constraint using arrays of names.
    DataReconciliationEngine
    DataReconciliationEngine.addMassBalanceConstraint(String name, List<String> inletNames, List<String> outletNames)
    Convenience method to add a mass balance constraint around a node.
    DataReconciliationEngine
    DataReconciliationEngine.addVariable(ReconciliationVariable variable)
    Adds a variable to the reconciliation problem.
    DataReconciliationEngine
    SteadyStateDetector.createReconciliationEngine()
    Creates a DataReconciliationEngine pre-populated with variables from this detector.
    DataReconciliationEngine
    DataReconciliationEngine.setGrossErrorThreshold(double threshold)
    Sets the gross error detection threshold (z-value).
